reviewText: Our children love them!  I'm not sure what else to say about them...fun movies!  A nice collection to buy for them.

These new 4-DVD sets Disney is releasing are interesting, but I don't know about this one. The Haunted Mansion was a huge disappointment, which could have been amazing (released shortly after the first Pirates of the Caribbean movie, which is the only really well-made one of the four). Tower of Terror--wasn't that a TV-only, B-movie? I don't recognize the Mr. Toad's Wild Ride movie, and didn't Country Bears flop too? Your money is probably better spent on the Ichabod and Mr. Toad DVD-- The Adventures of Ichabod and Mr. Toad (Disney Gold Classic Collection)a set of two classic 50's era Disney cartoons that have been all-but forgotten by the company. The Legend of Sleepy Hollow cartoon is a wonderful take on the classic American story, narrated and sung by none other than Bing Crosby! It's perfect Disney fare for spooky family fun. The Mr. Toad cartoon is fun as well--classic animation, some famous voices, and a story any kid would enjoy. Do be warned, the weasel villains use some knives and guns, and even smoke cigars--so parents should decide whether they're comfortable with that prior to letting children watch. Still, The Legend of Sleepy Hollow will give more real 'Thrills & Chills' than this set.
Love the old Disney movies
Great value for the classics!
Love
great

I bought this for my kids so they would have a chance to see movies associated with the rides at Disney World, Tower of Terror and Haunted Mansion. I know these movies are a bit cheesy and were made long after the rides, but the kids liked them. The other two movies were just a bonus. It was cheaper to purchase this set of 4 than to get the other two movies separately. All the movies play well and are decent quality. Considering they aren't great movies to begin with, I think these were a good price and will work as good additions to our Halloween movie collection.
Was very pleased that they were not all crammed on to one disc. Wish some of the formats would have been in wide screen. But over all for the money I was pleased.

I am a true lover of classic Disney cinema so when I saw the Disney 4 movie collection I eager collected them all. Many of these contained movies that my children have watched si many times that DVDs are almost wore out. This collection including the Haunted House, a weird version if Wind in the willows, and Tower of Terror, as well as another truly forgettable bad movie. I am giving this a three star rating because little daughter enjoyed. This collection to me may have been called thrills and chills but my problem is this collection of movies that are direct to DVD or should be is neither thrilling or chilling and in a couple instances almost unwatchable

Yet, for the price, the other three are fun, well done, and great viewing.  Be sure to give Country Bears a chance. We found the story-line fun and interesting and some of the voice stars will surprise you when their names come around in the credits.

As a die hard fan of it am sad, but its really nice now having completed my HTH collection with this movie. the other movies were good aswell, my personal rank is first tower of terror, second haunted mansion, third country bears and last but not least Mr toads wild ride

Excellent collection for an excellent price.  I originally wanted to order just the tower of terror, but this collection was actually cheaper so I opted for it instead.  Who can turn down 4 movies for less than the price of one?  Each DVD was in a separate holder in one DVD case.

This is one of my favorite rides and after watching the movie it's one of my favorite movies.  It's a good movie that has a very young Kirsten Dunst in it and Steve Guttenburg.

Yes you are correct: This is in regards to the reply someone made, I had forgotten that the movie was made after the ride.  I remember reading something about the movie being filmed using the lobby of the ride and some of the surrounding area in front.  I appreciate the correction as I really hate putting inaccurate information out.

I love tower of terror, and I haven't seen the movie in years! so I wanted it on dvd. I also am a member of the Disney movie club, they had this for $20... got it here for $11! best thing ever! 75 points on Disney movie rewards! I also love how it comes with Haunted mansion, not a great movie, but I love the ride! and I haven't watched mrtoad in a very long time! same with contry bears! so glad I brought it!

I bought this for haunted mansion and tower of terror.  I've never seen the frog movie and the country bears isn't my favorite.  My son liked it though. That movie is more for the kids , while the first 2 I mentioned are great for family movie nights and would grow with the child. Great set for a great price!

Great price for 4 movies! My family watched these before heading to Disneyworld - it was fun to see each place after watching these. I especially love the Tower of Terror movie. It's my favorite ride of all the parks and they obviously shot some of the scenes on location, which makes it even more interesting. Yes, it was originally a silly made for TV movie but it does have a couple of big names and is pretty entertaining. The Haunted Mansion is a little scary for smaller kids, but if you know the history of the ride there are some interesting tidbits to pick up on. Overall, a great value and enjoyable before or after a Disney vacation.
Who doesn't love the old Disney movies?  Great addition to the family movie night collection.
great movies.  kids love them

My 4 year old nephew was mesmerized by the Tower of Terror ride at Disneyland.  He enjoyed seeing the movie afterward.  Trivia fact: it was the first movie based on a Disney ride.  The fact that it comes in a multipack is a nice bonus.

I enjoyed all these movies. I had never seen Tower of Terror or Mr Toads Wild Ride. To rank them I would say Haunted Mansion is the best film in this collection followed by Tower Of Terror, Country Bears and Mr Toads Wild Ride.

I thought I would post this info since it's not in the description.

Tower Of Terror is fullscreen or 1:33:1 ratio.
Haunted Manson is widescreen 16X9 2:35:1 ratio
Mr. Toad's Wild ride is listed on the box as widescreen 1:85:1 it isn't. At least mine isn't. On my Blu Ray player its in 1:33:1 but also has the black bars at the top and bottom.
County Bears is 1:33:1 Fullscreen.

When watching on an HD TV with a Blu Ray player Tower Of Terror, Mr. Toads Wild Ride and Country Bears all have the black bars on the side. Have not tried watching them on a regular DVD player.

I love Disney and I think they did an excellent job in turning some of the rides into movies.  I think Haunted Mansion is one of the best movies to come out of the Disney studios in a long time.  I was glad to see Steve Guttenberg again, too.
Great movies, great way to wind down.  Love Disney anything this is also a great value.  Thanks for putting them all together
Bought this collection to watch with my Grandkids.  We had a ball, added to the season. They loved it, they got so excited.

My children and grandchildren and I have thourghly enjoyed this collection. Partly because we have managed to go on almost all of the rides. Then you watch the interpretation of the ride in movie form. I was very impressed with "Mr. Toad's Wild Ride". I was expecting it to be animated. To see humans actually protraying the animals was fantastic. It was certainly a positive choice when selecting this collection. An experience for the whole family.
Perfect for little ones and such a good value for the price. My 8yr old wanted to see this movie after riding this ride at Disney...
This is a nice collection to have, especially if you love Halloween.  These shows are great for that time of year or just if you want a good scare.
This is a gift for great grandson for Christmas, so no one has watched it yet. Am sure is great

This is a great little collection of obscure Disney movies.  They all have rides based on the at Disneyland and CA Adventure, so it's fun for the kids to see them before or even after your Disney trip.

I bought this specifcally for the movie, Mr. Toad's Wild Ride.  I own hundreds of DVDs.  I have spent a number of years changing over my VHS collection to DVD,  This is the first time I have seen this movie for sale anywhere on DVD.  It had been on my "to buy" list for a lot of years.

Really enjoy this. The movies were exciting and yet family oriented. Was nice to sit and enjoy family time together with our popcorn too!

I received this set as a gift for christmas and I loved watching each of the movies. I loved all 4 of them. I already knew that I liked The Haunted Mansion and the Country Bears. I never saw the Tower Of Terror or Mr. Toad's Wild Ride, I ended up enjoying them as much as the other two movies.
  I would recommend this four pack to any Disney Movie fan out there!

Didn't know how to rate this one!  I'm giving it four stars because the case and DVDs are fine.  However, the movies themselves aren't top notch for Disney productions.  We've watched two so far, and they're kind of like B Movies, but with famous actors in them.  Strange!  Anyway, it's a good price so I say go for it if you like things Disney :)

Mainly dropping a review on this for the packaging.  While its not clear that I can tell, this is a 4 movie pack that comes on 4 DVD's in one case.  That means that these are the same movies that you can buy by themselves, but as a collection.  I was a bit concerned because I didn't know if they were on one or two DVD's between all 4 movies, I know that picture quality can suffer.  Not the case and very happy to see that!
